function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited methods to control bacterial pandemics before antibiotics","Impact":"High mortality and spread of bacterial pandemics","Mitigation":"Invest in public health and urban planning, improve sanitation and hygiene measures","Technologies":"Advanced medical research and urban planning strategies","People":"Population at risk","Owner":"Public health authorities and urban planners"},{"Description":"Dedicated architectural programs for containment","Impact":"Limited resources and uneven implementation of containment measures","Mitigation":"Standardize and regulate architectural programs, improve funding and resources","Technologies":"Architectural and construction technologies","People":"People living in contained areas","Owner":"Government and health organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of plagues on population","Impact":"High mortality and societal disruption","Mitigation":"Invest in public health, improve disease surveillance, and implement quarantine measures","Technologies":"Advanced medical research and surveillance technologies","People":"Population at risk","Owner":"Public health authorities and government"}]}
